currency.description: Currency symbol or code to display (default: "Rs")

className.description: Custom class name for the calendar container

cellClassName.description: Custom class name for individual day cells

modalClassName.description: Custom class name for the modal

showIndicators.description: Show/hide the subscription type indicators (default: true)

colors.type: { monthly?: string | undefined; yearly?: string | undefined; both?: string | undefined; }

animationConfig.type: { stiffness?: number | undefined; damping?: number | undefined; }

renderSubscriptionItem.description: Custom render function for subscription items in modal
